long_description: Stack the odds in your favor by using the Backcountry Access 10x magnifying loupe to study snow crystals. Studying snow crystals allows you to recognize potentially hazardous snowpack before heading into avalanche terrain. 10x magnification enlarges crystals for simple analysis. Backcountry Access 10x magnifying loupe folds down to a compact size so you can carry it on any trip; weighs 1.4 oz.
short_description: Stack the odds in your favor by using the Backcountry Access 10x magnifying loupe to study snow crystals.
